productfeatures: Face Detection, Image Stabilization, Panorama Mode, Touch Screen LCD
dimensions: 4.18 inches high x 2.43 inches wide x 0.85 inches deep
memory: Internal memory 9.5MB. SD (up to 2GB), SDHC (up to 32GB), SDXC (up to 64GB)
focusingtype: Active Auto, Active Infra-Red Auto, Manual, Manual/Automatic, Passive Auto, TTL Contrast Detection, TTL Phase Detection
zoom: 18x optical zoom, 90x digital zoom, 2x and 36x intelli zoom
resolution: Effective pixel 14.2 megapixels and total pixel 16.4 megapixels with 1/2.3-inch CCD image sensor
display: 3-inch, 460k dots, TFT LCD hVGA Hybrid Touch User Interface
